name: my_sql_poi_data
description: connection to a my sql db for storing points of interest.
author: Deebobo
help: This connection defines a table in a my-sql database that holds all the data required/produced for/by the 'points-of-interest function. This plugin requires the following parameters: - a reference to the my-sql database connection: this connection defines the database where the table will be located. - the name of the table and if this table needs to be created or not after saving the connection.
